long-description:"※This item is also offered in a pack. Refunds will not be offered for duplicate purchase.

Detroit: Become Human™ is the latest title in development by Quantic Dream that expands on the studio’s legacy of gripping
column23: narrative driven experiences (Fahrenheit/Heavy Rain™/ BEYOND: Two Souls™). Discover what it really means to be human in a powerful
column24:
emotional journey made of choice and consequences.

Set in Detroit City during the year 2036
column25: the city has been revitalized by the invention and introduction of Androids into everyday life. But when Androids start behaving as if they are alive
column26: events begin to spin out of control. Step into the roles of the story’s pivotal three playable characters
column27:
each with unique perspectives as they face their new way of life.

In this ambitiously bending and thrilling narrative
column28: every choice and action will not only determine the character’s fate
column29:
but that of the entire city and possibly beyond.

column108:
long-description:"How Far Will You Go To Be Free?

Download the Detroit: Become Human™ Demo

Detroit
column109:
2038. Lifelike androids have replaced the human workforce.
They never tire
column110:
disobey or say “no”… until something changes.
Some of them have started to behave irrationally
column111:
as if they were feeling emotions…

• Tell your own story. Every decision has a consequence through a branching narrative

• Take control of three androids in their quest to discover who they really are.

• Face moral dilemmas and make life or death decisions.

Because this is a trial version
column112:
we do not guarantee all functionality in this trial version.

Copyright:
© 2018 Sony Interactive Entertainment Europe. Developed by Quantic Dream.

Purchase or use of this item is subject to SEN Terms of Service and User Agreement."
